summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating plumbing; creating a new section in the Seattle Municipal code to adopt portions of the uniform Plumbing Code, 1982 edition, its appendices, various IAMPO Installation Standards, and Chapter 22 of the Uniform Mechanical Code as modified by the Seattle Mechanical Code Supplement (a portion of Ordinance 111201) as the Seattle Plumbing Code; and repealing Seattle Municipal Code S 22.502.010.
